ygData.subject: The Forgoten Crew
ygData.msgSnippet: A strange looking ship that almost looked as if it had been pieced back together slowly fell into orbit around the planet and small fragments broke off as it

A strange looking ship that almost looked as if it had
been pieced
back together slowly fell into orbit around the planet
and small
fragments broke off as it screamed down to the planet
in a large
fireball.

The ground smashed apart creating a tidle wave of
earth into the
trees as the ship skiped across the earth making holes
in the ground
everytime it hit, inside red lights were flashing and
people were
trying there best not to be thrown around holding onto
there
computers of anything that wasn't flying around.  the
ship slowed to
a stop leaving a trail of broken earth behind them

Another Bot stood up and threw a large plate of the
roof that was on
his back to the side "everyone ok?" he asked looking
around as others
slowly got to there feet "a little banged up but still
working" one
of them said brushing dust off his armor, one of the
others got up
and looked the Bot in the eyes "i told u this ship
wasn't going to
make it back home" he said with a bit of anger "we
sould have staye
on the other planet and waited for a Maximal Ship to
find us" he said
throwing a plate aside to get to a computer "well the
good news is
were all in one piece, bad news were on ANOTHER $@%@*&
PLANET" he
cried in anger

the 4th bot got to her feet and walked over to large
hole in the
wall "I got more bad news" she said turning around "we
lost the right
wing in the crash" she said walking outside "so, hows
it matter if
there a wing missing" said one of the others following
her "u forget
about our carrgo?" she said turing around to face him
"Blades free
now" she said with a frown
